Omaha.KIH61: KIH61 (sometimes referred to as Omaha All Hazards) is a NOAA Weather Radio station that serves the Omaha-Council Bluffs metropolitan area and surrounding cities. It is programmed from the National Weather Service forecast office in Omaha, Nebraska with its transmitter located in downtown Omaha. It broadcasts weather and hazard information for Burt, Cass, Dodge, Douglas, Otoe, Sarpy, Saunders, and Washington Counties in Nebraska as well as Harrison, Mills, and Pottawattamie counties in Iowa.
